title: Hauntings and Possessions - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/1/22
itunes:title: Hauntings and Possessions - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/1/22
description:
George Noory and author Lynn Hightower investigate demonic possessions and exorcisms, why there has been an increase in demand for exorcisms during the pandemic, and what it is that demons want from their victims.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
